Text: A V 9 Subtitles need some correcting but overall it's great. Will try to see if I can upload corrections on subscene if I can recover my password from them. Will post a link here if they're ready, if not submagic is a free program to work on subtitles folks. Thank you SaM for a great job encoding this again.

A10 V10 - Great movie, top 10 in the last few years for sure! Storyline is intelligent and entertaining, i wouldn't change it even a bit. Actors rocked, really really good acting! Quality was great! At site aole.ciroblazevic.com there is Django and Hobbit in HD already, great stuff! Thnx once again for this fantastic movie!

Thank you for the movie SaM.

Nice one mate!
